TrinhDoChuyenMon.CountByIdRecord: SELECT count(*) as countRecord from {0} WHERE {1} = @TrinhDoChuyenMonID;
TrinhDoChuyenMon.DeleteMany: DELETE FROM TrinhDoChuyenMon WHERE TrinhDoChuyenMonID IN @recordIDs
TrinhDoChuyenMon.FindById: select *, d.DiplomaName from TrinhDoChuyenMon p left join Diploma d on p.DiplomaID = d.DiplomaID WHERE TrinhDoChuyenMonID = @TrinhDoChuyenMonID;
